test-case.name: qName-1
test-case.description: Evaluation of constructor function xs:QName for which the argument is not a literal.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName()`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName("http://www.example.com/")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName("http://www.example.com/", "ncname", "error")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName("http://www.w3.org/2005/xpath-functions", "prefix:local") eq xs:QName("fn:local")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-5
test-case.description: A QName cannot start with a digit.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName("", "error:ncname")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName((), "error:ncname")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-8
test-case.description: URI/QName arguments appearing in wrong order, leading to an invalid QName.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-9
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName("", "local") eq xs:QName("local")`.

test-case.name: K-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-10
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `QName((), "local") eq xs:QName("local")`.

test-case.name: K2-ExpandedQNameConstructFunc-1
test-case.description: The last argument must be a string.
